data.title: Famous peoples favourites
data.meta_description: Who are the favourite football teams, and sport teams, of some famous celebrities, have a look here,
data.text:
Soccer teams or Political Party unless stated, these people have expressed what is essentially real support for these at some time, For the political parties, none (unless they also got power with them) of these people are responsible for any bad stuff their parties have done, they just did some good civic stuff of being interested in politics, so good on them, but also not all are out and out supporters all the time, they have just expressed some support at some time, some a bit more so, and some more famously involved, Though I do not say good on for them for anybody who supported far right parties, I am condemning their support for when they supported far right parties, but I dont list many of them and sad they did,. But I also list centrist and more left wing parties supporters. I do no condemn ones who supported centre right parties of course and centrist and left wing (unless they did bad stuff in that context) . P.S What I think does not really matter that much really. Its fun to see who these folk supported. especially the soccer and football teams. Its great lots of people have lots of opinions, and I should not be too judgemental, though have to admit I am a bit centrist on most things, but that could mean anything.

​

You could also call this page,

​
